Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival.... Trustworthy seller though
Reviews.Author: Blackstone Asphalt
Reviews.Content: Wouldnt work at all.... DOA.... Seller was great however and refunded price and return shipping.  Probably just a bad unit as these cameras are sold under many different names with good reviews.

ProductInfo.Features:
Superiority: upport monitor via cellphone or computer. in computer software, no worry to install the IE activex, support  iPhone and Android phone
no need to do port forwarding to realize plug and play; 1/4 CMOS sensor 300,000  pixel
Support TCP/IP HTTP DHCP etc.
VGA(640*480), QVGA(320*240)
Built-in speaker, also support external speaker port
ProductInfo.Name: EasyN F3-M187 Wireless IP Camera WiFi CCTV Security System Pan/Tilt, 8 LED 10m IR Night Vision
